actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To restore to taxpayers awareness of the true cost of government by eliminating the withholding of income taxes by employers and requiring individuals to pay income taxes in monthly installments, and for other purposes.
short_title: Cost of Government Awareness Act of 2000

summary.text: Cost of Government Awareness Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal income tax withholding and to require individuals to pay estimated income tax on a monthly basis.

titles.title: Cost of Government Awareness Act of 2000

To restore to taxpayers awareness of the true cost of government by eliminating the withholding of income taxes by employers and requiring individuals to pay income taxes in monthly installments, and for other purposes.
